text: Timothy Howard St George Byng, 11th Viscount Torrington, born 13 July 1943,HANSARD 1803–2005 - People - Mr Timothy Byng is a British peer.Vacher's Parliamentary Companion, No. 1092, December 1998, P137 He succeeded his grandfather, Arthur Stanley Byng, 10th Viscount Torrington (1876–1961). Byng has three daughters and no sons. His title, through male primogeniture, will likely pass to a distant Canadian cousin.Hui, Silvia; "Viscount’s story like a real-life Downton Abbey", The Chronicle Herald, 14 April 2013. title: Timothy Byng, 11th Viscount Torrington
